nodes.label: Optimal Transport
nodes.name: Optimal Transport
nodes.description: Theory of transporting mass with minimal cost. Foundational for comparing probability distributions.

nodes.label: Gradient Flows
nodes.name: Gradient Flows
nodes.description: Curves of steepest descent for an energy functional. Describes the evolution of systems towards equilibrium.

nodes.label: Large Deviations
nodes.name: Large Deviations
nodes.description: Theory of the probability of rare events. Crucial for understanding stability and phase transitions.

nodes.label: Stochastic Control
nodes.name: Stochastic Control
nodes.description: Theory of controlling stochastic systems to optimize an objective.

nodes.label: Metric Geometry
nodes.name: Metric Geometry
nodes.description: The study of geometry on non-smooth spaces, like spaces of probability measures.

nodes.label: Wasserstein Space
nodes.name: Wasserstein Space
nodes.description: The space of probability measures equipped with the Wasserstein distance, a key object in OT.

nodes.label: Hellinger-Kantorovich Space
nodes.name: Hellinger-Kantorovich Space
nodes.description: A metric space of measures that interpolates between Wasserstein and Hellinger distances, for unbalanced OT.

nodes.label: Diffusion Models
nodes.name: Diffusion Models
nodes.description: State-of-the-art generative models that learn to reverse a diffusion process.

nodes.label: Score-Based Methods
nodes.name: Score-Based Methods
nodes.description: A class of generative models closely related to diffusion models, based on estimating the score function of the data distribution.

nodes.label: Generative AI
nodes.name: Generative AI
nodes.description: AI that can generate new content, such as images, text, or code.

nodes.label: LLM Alignment
nodes.name: LLM Alignment
nodes.description: The process of aligning Large Language Models with human values and intentions.

nodes.label: DPO/GRPO
nodes.name: DPO/GRPO
nodes.description: Reinforcement learning techniques for fine-tuning language models.

nodes.label: Neural Optimal Transport
nodes.name: Neural Optimal Transport
nodes.description: Using neural networks to solve optimal transport problems.

nodes.label: GANs
nodes.name: GANs
nodes.description: Generative Adversarial Networks, a class of generative models.

nodes.label: Reinforcement Learning
nodes.name: Reinforcement Learning
nodes.description: Training agents to make sequences of decisions.

nodes.label: POMDP
nodes.name: POMDP
nodes.description: A framework for decision-making in partially observable environments.

nodes.label: LLM Training & Fine-Tuning
nodes.name: LLM Training & Fine-Tuning
nodes.description: Practical skill in training and adapting large language models.

nodes.label: Agentic Systems
nodes.name: Agentic Systems
nodes.description: Developing autonomous agents that can reason and act to achieve goals.

nodes.label: Synthetic Data Generation
nodes.name: Synthetic Data Generation
nodes.description: Creating artificial data for training AI models, e.g., for the ARC-2 challenge.

nodes.label: Image Generation
nodes.name: Image Generation
nodes.description: Generating novel images using generative models.

links.description: Wasserstein GANs use Optimal Transport distances as a loss function to improve training stability.
The mathematical structure of diffusion models is a gradient flow on the space of probability measures.
